history.proof: intros d H. hauto use: predta_ref_ok_check_complete, andb_true_intro unfold: DTA_ref_ok, dta_ref_ok_check.

exceptions.tactic: apply DTA_rect with (P:=fun d => dta_ref_ok_check d = true -> DTA_ref_ok d).
exceptions.exn: In environment d : DTA H : dta_ref_ok_check d = true Unable to unify "dta_ref_ok_check ?M1853 = true -> DTA_ref_ok ?M1853" with "match d with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end".
The reference H' was not found in the current environment.

original: intros d H. apply DTA_rect with (P:=fun d => dta_ref_ok_check d = true -> DTA_ref_ok d). intros p a. unfold dta_ref_ok_check. intros H'. apply dta_ref_ok_check_correct in H'. apply H'. auto.
